Morning.content: Good morning! 😊 What's one task you'd like to accomplish today?
Read 5 papers for the literature review
Great! 📚 How about breaking it down? Which paper will you start with and when?
I'll start with the papers on chatbots for therapy/wellbeing. I have already started
Awesome! 🤖 How long do you plan to spend on each paper to finish all five today?
I'm not really sure how long it will take. Ideally 30min for each, maybe closer to an hour. If I have more time I will read more papers
Sounds like a plan! 🕒 So, if you spend an hour per paper, you'll be done by when?
4:30 or so, assuming I don't do much else
Perfect! You've got this. 🙌 Reach out if you need any more help planning your day. Enjoy your reading! 📖
<3
Always here to help! Have a productive day! 🌟💼 Feel free to check in anytime.
Good morning! 🌞 How would you like to spend your weekend to recharge and prepare for the upcoming week? 🌳📚🎵
Good morning! 🌞 How are you planning to spend your weekend? Any tasks that you could delegate or defer to make it more relaxing? 😊
Well actually I have a few things I want to get done today. It will be nice to have them off my to-do list
That's great! 📝 Can you share what these tasks are? Maybe we can identify which ones can be delegated or deferred to lighten your load. 😊
It's mostly personal errands I need to run.
Understood! 🏃‍♂️ Could you list a few of these errands? We might find some that can be delegated or postponed. 😊
Good morning! 😊 What's the most important task you plan to tackle today?
The only thing on my To-Do is the literature review. Just grinding through as many papers as I can
Sounds like a big task! 📚 Is this literature review urgent and important for your work today?
Important but not urgent
Great! 🌟 Since it's important but not urgent, how many hours do you plan to dedicate to it today?
8, I guess. Unless something else comes up that I need to work on
That's a solid plan! 🕗 Just to wrap up, is there anything else you might need to prioritize if it comes up today?
Course registration, maybe, or if I get a new task from my supervisor
Understood! 📝 Remember, it's okay to adjust your plan if needed. Have a productive day and feel free to reach out if you need more help! 😊
This is a test
Absolutely! I'm here if you need any more assistance. Have a great day! 😊
Hi, do you have a second to chat?
Of course! 😊 What's the main task you're planning to work on today?
I'm still working on the literature review
Great! 📚 Is this task still important but not urgent for today? Or has its urgency changed?
Yes, still important but not urgent
Perfect! 🌟 How many hours are you planning to dedicate to it today?
I finished the literature review and I'm trying to decide what to do with the rest of the day
That's great progress! 🎉 Are there any other tasks that might be urgent or important for you to tackle today?
I can't think of any
No worries! 😊 Enjoy the rest of your day and remember, I'm here if you need help planning tomorrow's tasks. Have a great day!
Can you still respond to DMs?
Absolutely! 😊 What's the main task you're planning to focus on today?
Good morning! 😊 What's the first task you're planning to tackle today?
lit review again
Sounds like a focused task! 📚 How about scheduling a 15-minute break after every hour of reading to refresh your mind? What do you think?
That sounds like a good idea
Great! 🌟 What enjoyable activity could you do during these breaks to help you relax and recharge?
Go for a short walk and maybe meditate. 15 minutes is a bit long, maybe more like 5-10
Perfect! 🚶‍♂️🧘‍♂️ A short walk and meditation sound refreshing. So, shall we plan for a 5-10 minute break after every hour of work today?
yep
Fantastic! Enjoy your work and breaks today. Remember, I'm here if you need any more assistance. Have a productive day! 😊👍
Good morning! 🌞 How about adding a quick 10-minute workout to kickstart your day? 💪
Thanks, that's a good idea!
Great! 🎉 What type of physical activity do you enjoy that you could do for 10 minutes? 🏋️‍♀️🚴‍♂️🧘‍♂️
Any suggestions?
Absolutely! How about a brisk walk outside or a quick yoga session? Both can be refreshing and energizing. Which one would you prefer? 🚶‍♂️🧘‍♀️
I'll go for a walk!
Fantastic choice! 🚶‍♂️ When do you plan to take this walk during your workday? Before work, during a break, or after work?
Right now
Perfect! Enjoy your walk. Remember, I'm here to assist you with your day's plan anytime. Have a productive day! 🌼
Good morning! 🌞 What's the most important task you plan to tackle today?
My main work task is still the lit review, but I also have some errands to run; e.g. I need to go to the post office
Sounds like a busy day! 📚🏃‍♂️ What potential obstacles might come in the way of completing these tasks?
Good morning! 🌞 What's the most important task you're planning to tackle today?
Good morning! 🌞 Since it's the weekend, let's focus on relaxation. What's one activity you enjoy that helps you unwind and clear your mind?
Good morning! 🌞 Since it's Sunday, let's focus on relaxation. What's one activity you enjoy that helps you unwind and clear your mind?
Good morning! 🌞 What's the first task you plan to tackle today at work?
Take a wild guess
Haha, alright! 🤔 Is it responding to emails?
Lit review :face_with_diagonal_mouth:
Ah, a literature review! 📚 How much time do you plan to dedicate to this task today?
About 7 hours, I guess
That's quite a stretch! 😮 How about scheduling short breaks and some personal time in between to maintain balance? 🧘‍♂️🍵
Yeah, I'll take breaks. I have a meeting too, at 12:30 I think
Great! 🙌 After your meeting, how about setting aside some time for a relaxing activity you enjoy? 🎧📖
Good morning! 😊 What's the most important task you plan to tackle first today?

I just got back from my first class of the semester; now I need to work on integrating the PITCH playground into the slackbot architecture. I should also work on the lit review a little more (esp. preparing a presentation for it)
Sounds like a busy day! 📚 Which task feels more urgent and important: integrating the PITCH playground or preparing the lit review presentation?
The playground
Great! 🎯 How about focusing on the playground task first and then moving on to the lit review presentation? Does that sound like a good plan?
yep
Awesome! 🙌 Have a productive day. Remember, it's okay to take short breaks. Check in later?
Sounds good
Absolutely! Feel free to reach out if you need any more assistance. Have a fantastic day! 😊👍
